animeTitle: Cine Mileage Card x Asa Da yo! Kaishain
animeDescription: A collaboration between Asa da yo! Kaishain Toho Cinema's new frequent viewer Cine Mileage Card. For every 6 movies you watch, you get 1 free. More benefits are planned to be added to card holders.
animeRelated: ['Asa Da yo! Kaishain', 'Kaishain x Sumida Suizokukan Bikkuri! Kai Matsuri CM', 'Kaishain vs. Credit Card Kachou: CreCar no Rule Shitteru kai?']
